endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: top_k

param_schema.title: Top K
param_schema.description: Reduces sampling to the k most likely tokens.

parameters.description: Reduces sampling to the k most likely tokens.

parameters.name: top_p

param_schema.title: Top P
param_schema.description: Reduces sampling to tokens with cumulative probability of p. When set to  `0` (default), top_k sampling is used.

parameters.description: Reduces sampling to tokens with cumulative probability of p. When set to  `0` (default), top_k sampling is used.

parameters.name: temperature

param_schema.title: Temperature
param_schema.description: Controls the 'conservativeness' of the sampling process. Higher temperature means more diversity.

parameters.description: Controls the 'conservativeness' of the sampling process. Higher temperature means more diversity.

parameters.name: classifier_free_guidance

param_schema.title: Classifier Free Guidance
param_schema.description: Increases the influence of inputs on the output. Higher values produce lower-varience outputs that adhere more closely to inputs.

parameters.description: Increases the influence of inputs on the output. Higher values produce lower-varience outputs that adhere more closely to inputs.
